html:
I've shared Idea - Privacy Watch website
Message from arafalov@gmail.com: 
Hello,
Saw tos;dr website, great idea. Something (very basic) similar was done about a year or two ago: http://www.tosback.org/timeline.php . Might be some collaboration there. Also, some time ago, I wrote my own thoughts on the topic which you may find interesting. 

Enjoy and keep up the good work.

Regards,
   Alex.

Click to open:
  • Idea - Privacy Watch website

Idea - Privacy Watch website

Idea - Privacy Watch website

Lots of people subscribed to online services with EULAs that may change at any point.

This project allows to subscribe to all the EULAs automatically and do automatic tracking and things with it.

  1. Check when privacy notice changes.
  2. Get people to vote if particular change is significant or not. (or check automatically)
  3. Also let vote for good/bad parts of the license
  4. Setup forums if the changes are significant
  5. Bubble changes in EULA to the top
  6. Automatically find privacy notices on the website, using google search and text understanding.
  7. Use Computational Linguistics to do coreference resolutions within documents
  8. Allow people to highlight and comment on particular parts of the documents.
  9. Provide notification via RSS or email
  10. Aggregate micropayments to hire lawers to explain particular parts (or to make it subscription only with public part being the ratings)

Google Drive: create, share, and keep all your stuff in one place.

--
www.tos-dr.info // www.twitter.com/tosdr // www.github.com/Unhosted/ToS-DR
